entry.title: Cascades Pro Select - H045 - Kraft Hand Paper Towel Roll 8" x 425' - 12/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

Absorb spills and dry freshly-cleaned hands with these Janitorial natural brown paper towels.

With a hardwound roll and non-perforated design, Janitorial paper towels allow users to easily tear off exactly how much they need, effectively minimizing waste and boosting your bottom line! Made of eco-friendly kraft paper, these strong paper towels are guaranteed to do the trick in any bathroom, handwashing station, or spill station and at a price that won't break your budget.

Cascades PRO Select® natural roll paper towels have 12 rolls per case and 60 cases per pallet. With 7.9'' x 350 feet per roll, 1.9'' core diameter and 5.3'' roll diameter, this roll towel is absorbent, functional and reliable. This roll paper towel is an economical choice and is perfect for the everyday needs.

Cascades PRO Select® 350 feet roll paper towels may be small, but they are absorbent and are made from 100% recycled fiber, offering environmental benefits. This roll paper towel combines value and affordability for restrooms, breakrooms and kitchens for places across the education, industrial, foodservice and retail markets.

 

Long-Lasting and Eco-Friendly

Boasting an impressive length that reduces the need to constantly restock paper towels, these towels are an excellent economical choice for high volume venues! And because they are made of 100% recycled fibers with a minimum of 45% post-consumer content, these towels get the job done while minimizing your ecological footprint.

Non-Perforated

The towel's non-perforated design helps minimize waste and save you money by letting guests tear off what they need instead of a predetermined length that may be too much.

2" Core

Thanks to a 2" universal core, this hardwound roll of towels can conveniently be used in the vast majority of dispensers.

Textured

The towels feature an embossed texture that helps you efficiently wipe off countertops, clean up messes, and dry hands

entry.title: Cascades Pro Select - H110 - White Singlefold Paper Towel - 4000 Sheets/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

For an absorbent, economical paper towel, choose this Janitorial white Single-fold towel.

Supply your restaurant, hotel, or cafe with this absorbent, 1-ply single-fold paper towel! Even before use, the convenient inner packaging allows for easy, space saving storage. With this practical towel, your guests and staff will be able to quickly and efficiently dry their hands with ease. Plus, the durable material can be used for spills when needed for multi-purpose use!

Cascades PRO Select® singlefold paper towel, made with 100% recycled material, keeps hands dry while reducing waste in restrooms, breakrooms and cafeterias.

The one at a time dispensing of Cascades PRO Select® singlefold paper towels, help to reduce waste, while its 100% recycled fiber make it the sustainable choice at an economic price. Each absorbent towel will keep your hands dry after every use. Optimal for use across a wide range of markets such: education, industrial, foodservice, and retail.

Folded Design

Boasting a smart, single-fold design, this towel is great for reducing excess consumption since it allows just one towel to be dispensed at a time. In addition, this paper towel conveniently fits in C-fold and M-fold towel dispensers for versatile use.

Easily Dispensed

This paper towel allows for easy placement into dispensers, so your staff can quickly refill them as needed.

Versatile Use

This white paper towel can be used in various locations such as your establishment's restroom for guests or in the kitchen for your employees.

Eco-Friendly

Made out of 100% recycled fiber, this towel is great for any eco-friendly business. 

Cascades Pro Select - H110 White Singlefold Towel - 4000 Sheets/Case

entry.title: Belle-Pak - 4.5" x 5.5" Packing Slip Envelopes Printed Bilingual - 1000 Pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cantech
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

Easy to apply packing slip envelope. Ideal for attaching documentation to packaging. Transparent polyethylene film - easy visibility. Aggressive rubber resin adhesive sticks well to many surfaces. Full-back easy peel paper liner. No need for dispenser - stacks in box.

FBC101 Printed Packing Envelops

Belle-Pak - 4.5" x 5.5" Packing Slip Envelops Backload Printed Bilingual - 1000 Pcs

entry.title: SmartChoice - 33" x 5.5" White Masking Paper Roll - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 28.49

SmartChoice - 33" x 5.5" White Masking Paper Roll - Each

  • White Masking Paper is specifically manufactured for automotive aftermarket applications.
  • This paper Provides excellent resistance to paint solvents, urethanes, base coats and clear coats.
  • Can withstand bake cycles up to 400 degrees F (204 degrees C) for 30 minutes. Conformable.
  • It is designed to be used with Masking Tapes and Masking Equipment.
  • Flexible and pliable to cover irregular surfaces for higher productivity
  • To prevent bleed through, apply paper with enough slack to keep puddles of clear coat or high-solvent paint from forming.

entry.title: SmartChoice - DD30 - 24" x 7" White Paper Roll - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 34.99

SmartChoice - DD30 - 24" x 7" White Paper Roll - Each

  • Use White Packing & Wrapping Paper as a Large Craft Paper, Sketch and Plotter Paper, White Paper Banquet Roll and White Paper Table Cover
  • Endless Blank Crafting Paper white art paper to work with, your art class or your kids can enjoy hours and hours of fun crafting, drawing, painting and more
  • Thick and Durable White Construction Paper Roll; Made with heavy duty paper, this sturdy craft roll can be used for a number of different projects without fear of it ripping or tearing
  • Works With Many Different Materials; Use these white craft paper rolls for acrylic and oil paints, chalk, crayon, markers, felt pens, finger painting, water color, tempera and more
  • Cut it Down to Any Size or Shape; With this roll, white paper is at your disposal and will allow you to cut and slice it as needed
  • Acid Free Design Ensures Long Lasting Art Pieces; This fade resistant paper rolls, white in color, will allow your art to shine for years to come without fading the color over time

entry.title: SmartChoice - DD30 - 36" x 7" Kraft Paper Roll - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 31.99

SmartChoice - DD30 - 36" x 7" Kraft Paper Roll - Each

  • Gift packaging: This perfect kraft paper wrapper is exactly what you need to wrap Christmas gifts. It maintains the traditional brown color and looks neat and elegant. You can choose any way you want to decorate gifts.
  • Perfect thickness: Gift Packaging Paper is made of high-quality kraft paper, soft and light, but strong and durable, and good flexibility. When used in gift packaging, it will not tear or crack. Another point, it is not transparent.
  • Widely applicable: Kraft paper can be used not only as gift wrapping paper, but also as canvas and tablecloth for children, and as protective paper for protecting floors and furniture. It can be used anywhere it is needed to facilitate your life.
  • Arbitrary cutting: This Kraft roll can be cut into any size or shape of kraft paper as required, which can effectively avoid waste and allow you to save more effort in the packaging process.
  • A low cost, all-purpose packaging material.
  • Cushioning: Use as an economical void fill for shipping.
  • 100% recycled.
  • Wrapping: Cover boxes, books and parts to protect against scratches.
  • 100% recycled kraft paper: Kraft paper is wax-free and uncoated. It is environmentally friendly traditional brown kraft paper, not butcher paper. It is made of recycled fiber, which is green and environmentally friendly, and can be recycled again after use.

entry.title: SmartChoice - 4R Polished Cotton Twine - 1 Roll x 281'
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 9.99

SmartChoice - 4R Polished Cotton Butcher Twine - 1 Roll x 281'

Polished cotton primarily used for wrapping and packaging or tying meats and poultry in the food service industry.

This high quality, professional sausage twine is made of a strong poly/cotton fiber, which is the perfect heavy twine for a variety of kitchen tasks. This spool of twine is sold like there is ample twine to create many savory dishes.

Use this twine to tie back and truss chicken and turkey legs when roasting, (which helps the meat to cook evenly and stay in place), tie bundles of herbs, hang meat to dry, tie up roasts, or keep pork, beef, fish and other meats fresh with butcher paper.
